ai-patthana17.27:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.27:1.1_0: Not being exerted, not skilled in foods, and doesn’t give rise to yet.
ai-patthana17.27:1.1_1: Not doing so, those who don’t give rise to unprofitable states. ...
ai-patthana17.27:1.1_2: Not doing so, skilled in loss, and not skilled in means.
ai-patthana17.27:2.1_0: Not being exerted, not skilled in loss of focusing on skillfulness.
ai-patthana17.27:2.1_1: Not being exerted, not skilled in loss of focusing on skillfulness. ...
ai-patthana17.27:2.1_2: One who is not skilled in loss of impingement and not skilled in practicing excessive no cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.27:3.1_0: One who has not declared unprotectorrectly, without resenting the teaching.
ai-patthana17.27:3.1_1: One who has not declared unprotectorrectly, without resenting the teaching.
ai-patthana17.27:3.1_2: Such things don’t arise in someone who hasn’t answered, and has not been independent of others.
ai-patthana17.27:3.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
